content: 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch flower with yarn f chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to make a loop then round 1 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 1dc 1ch 1dc 2ch 3 times 1dc 1ch slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 2 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *1dc 1ch skip chain space 1dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 3 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *3dc 1ch skip chain space 3dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 4 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1tr 2dc in same space *3dc decrease 3ch skip chain space decrease 3dc ** 2dc 2tr 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 2dc in starting space slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 5 4ch counts as 1tr 1tr 2dc in next treble_crochet *4dc decrease 3ch 1sc in chain space 3ch decrease 4dc ** 2dc 1tr in treble_crochet 1tr 2dc in next treble_crochet repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 2dc in starting st slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 6 1ch 1sc in same st *4ch 1sc in next treble_crochet 3ch skip 3 1sc 3ch skip 3 1sc in chain space 3ch skip single_crochet 1sc in chain space 3ch skip 3 1sc 3ch skip 3 ** 1sc in treble_crochet repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of starting single_crochet round 7 slip_stitch in chain space 1ch 1sc 4ch 1sc in same space *3ch skip single_crochet 1sc in chain space 3ch skip single_crochet 5 times ** 1sc 4ch 1sc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of starting single_crochet round 8 slip_stitch in chain space 3ch counts as 1dc 2dc 2ch 3dc in same space * skip single_crochet 4dc in chain space 3 times 1dc in single_crochet 4dc in chain space skip single_crochet 3 times ** 3dc 2ch 3dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 3ch joining if you haven t done so already weave in any renaming ends from your squares and block them if necessary all joins are made using yarn g the squares in this blanket are all joined with crochet stitches worked from the front the stitches are joined together using single_crochet stitches which are made into the front loops only refer to the layout
